titleStmt.title: A cedars sad and solemn fall. Delivered in a sermon at the parish-church of Waltham Abbey in Essex ... At the funeral of James late Earl of Carlisle. By Thomas Reeve, D.D. preacher of Gods word there.
titleStmt.author: Reeve, Thomas, 1594-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for William Grantham, at the black Bear in St. Pauls Church-yard, near the little North-door,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
